Articles.Content:
it would be cool if you could see what ships are arriving/departing/in flight at a planet/star system when looking at supply lanes

Edited April 20, 2022 by jaf

10 minutes ago, jaf said:

it would be cool if you could see what ships are arriving/departing at a planet/star system when looking at supply lanes

Yeah

Nate Simpson addressed this I think. He something along the lines of “In KSP2 multiplayer, you’re going to see a lot of people arriving and departing from your friend’s colonies.” He also talked about delivery routes.

18 hours ago, BowlerHatGuy2 said:

Nate Simpson addressed this I think. He something along the lines of “In KSP2 multiplayer, you’re going to see a lot of people arriving and departing from your friend’s colonies.” He also talked about delivery routes.

Did I miss that? It be exciting to know if supply-line vessels were actually modeled in game or if they were managed in a more abstracted way with transport lists. You're certainly going to need to know when different resources are leaving and arriving to balance resource chains, but it would be a cool bonus to actually see the transports themselves automatically coming and going.
